title: Find a course of study | Study in Germany

text_sections.section_2: To improve the website, the and set and . In doing so, the DAAD and third parties transfer usage data to is no level of data protection comparable to that under EU law. By clicking the "Accept all" button, you consent to this processing. You can also find selection options and explanations of these cookies and processing at the end of this page under "Cookies". There you can consent at any time with effect for the future.
text_sections.section_12: How do you find the study programme that is right for you? Here we will tell you how you can get an overview, where you can find internationally oriented degree programmes and which tools are available to help you prepare.
text_sections.section_19: There are various websites that offer an overview of the more than 20,000 degree programmes at German higher education insitutions. We recommend the following websites to help you find the right degree programme for you.

meta_tags.title: Find a course of study
meta_tags.description: How to find the right study programme - Here we will tell you how you can get an overview, where you can find all study programmes in Germany and these with a strong international focus.
